Game.Name: Classic NES Series - The Legend of Zelda (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: In this classic NES game, you'll embark on a quest to find the Triforce, slay Ganon, and save Princess Zelda. The Legend of Zelda comes to the Game Boy Advance, complete with all the dungeons, puzzles, and menacing enemies from the original game. As Link, you can brandish a variety of weapons, including swords, boomerangs, bombs, and arrows. Collect rupees to buy even more weapons and other special items. There are many secrets, hidden passages, and caves to be found in Hyrule--now you can see if you still have what it takes to find them.Cheat: Start the Second QuestEnter the following at the name entry screen:Cheat: Unlock the Second QuestTo unlock the Second Quest, just simply finish the game.Cheat: Save without dying.To save your game without dying simply go to the item select screen then push UP + SELECT and you will get the Continue, Save, Retry Menu.
Game.Notes: The Legend of Zelda invented a genre and captivated a gaming generation. Now you can play the timeless NES adventure on your Game Boy Advance! The evil warlock Ganon has imprisoned Princess Zelda and plunged the peaceful land of Hyrule into darkness and despair. Only a young boy named Link has the courage to answer the call for a hero. Will he find the lost Triforce fragments, slay Ganon, and save Princess Zelda? Only you can decide the fate of Hyrule!
